text: Have a good day Bobby!

I know a song about Bobby the Bus, it goes
something like this...

The Wheels on the bus go round and round
Round and round, round and round

The Wheels on the bus go round and round
All Day Long

The Wipers on the bus go swish swish swish
Swish swish swish, swish swish swish

The Wipes on the bus go swish swish swish
all day long.

The doors on the bus go open and close
Open and close, open and close

The Doors on the bus go open and close
All Day long

Verse 5
The horn on the bus goes beep beep beep

Beep Beep Beep, Beep Beep Beep
The Horn on the bus goes beep beep beep
All Day Long

The engine on the bus goes brum brum brum
Brum Brum Brum, Brum Brum Brum

The engine on the bus goes brum brum brum
All Day Long

The Lights on the bus they light the way,
light the way, light they way

The lights on the bus they light the way
All day long

The Wheels on the bus go round and round
Round and round, round and round

The Wheels on the bus go round and round
All Day Long

Well done Bobby, it's been a long day and
now it's

time 
for you to rest.
Goodnight!
